data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value:
SELECT SP.EmpCode,sp.OthAllName,dbo.getDateKH(sp.StartDate) as StartDate,P.SecDescription as OldPost,D.SecDescription as OldDept, HRCompany.SecDescription as OldCompany,SP.LevelCode OldLevel,EFS.Salary,EFS.NewSalary,EFS.Level,EFS.Increase,TransferCode, EFS.DocNo,YEAR(CONVERT(DATE, EFS.CreatedOn)) AS YearTransfer,dbo.getDateKH(EFS.CreatedOn) YearCreatedOn,EFS.IsPro, dbo.getDateKH(EFS.EffectDate)EffectDate,dbo.getDateKH(EFS.ToDate)ToDate, CurrentRespon,Achievement,NewRespon,Reason,HRCompany.Images LOGO,dbo.getDateKH(GETDATE()) DateNow, (CASE WHEN EFS.IsPro=1 AND EFS.ToDate IS NOT NULL THEN (DATEDIFF(MONTH,EFS.EffectDate,EFS.ToDate))ELSE '' END)TotalProbation, DATEDIFF(year, CONVERT(date, SP.DOB, 105), GETDATE()) - (CASE WHEN DATEADD(year, DATEDIFF(year, CONVERT(date, SP.DOB, 105), GETDATE()), CONVERT(date, SP.DOB, 105)) > GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Age, (SELECT TOP 1 StampRejectImage FROM SYHRSetting)RejectImage, dbo.GET_Services_Lenght_String_EN(SP.StartDate, EFS.CreatedOn) AS ServicesLenght, --new (SELECT TOP 1 SecDescription from HRPosition PO WHERE PO.Code=EFS.Position)NewPost, (SELECT TOP 1 SecDescription from HRDepartment DE WHERE DE.Code=EFS.Department)NewDept, (SELECT TOP 1 SecDescription from HRLevel LE WHERE LE.Code=EFS.Level)NewLevel, (SELECT TOP 1 SecDescription from HRSection LE WHERE LE.Code=EFS.Section)NewSection, (SELECT TOP 1 CM.SecDescription from HRCompany CM WHERE CM.Company=EFS.CompanyCode)NewCompany, --Creater (SELECT TOP 1 OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=EFS.CreatedBy) CreateBy, (SELECT TOP 1 Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=EFS.CreatedBy) Signature,
(CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(EX.Approver) FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel in(@APROLEVEL+1))>0THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)N_A, (SELECT top 1 AllName FROM HRStaffProfile WHERE EmpCode=EFS.CreatedBy) AS RequestedName,dbo.getDateKH(EFS.RequestDate)RequestDate, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))Status1, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END))Status2, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END))Status3, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END))Status4,
dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate1, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate2, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate3, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate4,
(SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName1, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName2, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName3, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName4,
(SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))sign1, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))sign2, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))sign3, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=EFS.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=EFS.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END)))sign4
FROM HREFRequestTransferStaff EFS INNER JOIN HRStaffProfile SP on SP.EmpCode=EFS.EmpCode LEFT JOIN HRPosition P on P.Code=SP.JobCode LEFT JOIN HRDepartment D on D.Code=SP.DEPT LEFT JOIN HRCompany on HRCompany.Company=SP.CompanyCode WHERE EFS.DocNo=@DocNo
